```{r}
train <- read.csv("HTrainLast.csv")
head(train)

train_reduced <- train[, c(2:9, 11:81)]
summary(train_reduced)

train$affordabilitty

test <- read.csv("HTestLastNoY.csv")
head(test)


logistic_model <- glm(formula = affordabilitty ~ MSSubClass, data = train_reduced, family = binomial(), na.action = na.exclude)
prediction <- predict(logistic_model, type = "response")
prediction <- ifelse (prediction > 0.5, "Affordable", "Unaffordable")
prediction <- as.factor(prediction)
table(prediction, train$affordabilitty)
mean(prediction != train$affordabilitty)

prediction
train$affordabilitty
```
